PAGY_PAY_TXN_TM = #{pagyPayTxnTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAGY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SETTLE_DATE_OUT = #{settleDateOut,jdbcType=CHAR},
where PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT FROM BTH_MER_HANG_ACC WHERE HANG_ST = #{hangSt,jdbcType=CHAR } and ORIG_PAGY_TXN_SSN IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE BTH_MER_HANG_ACC SET HANG_ST = '01', LST_UPD_TM = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , SETTLE_DATE_OUT = #{settleDate,jdbcType=CHAR} WHERE PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE BTH_MER_HANG_ACC SET HANG_ST = '00' WHERE SETTLE_DATE_OUT = #{settleDate,jdbcType=CHAR}
